text: Kingsley Junior Coman (born 13 June 1996) is a French professional footballer who plays as a winger for Bayern Munich and the France national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Paris Saint-Germain 2012–13 Ligue 1 1 0 0 0 0 0 — 1 0 2013–14 Ligue 1 2 0 0 0 0 0 1 0 3 0 Total 3 0 0 0 0 0 1 0 4 0 Paris Saint-Germain II 2013–14 CFA 16 0 — — — 16 0 Juventus 2014–15 Serie A 14 0 4 1 2 0 — 20 1 2015–16 Serie A 1 0 0 0 0 0 1 0 2 0 Total 15 0 4 1 2 0 1 0 22 1 Bayern Munich (loan) 2015–16 Bundesliga 23 4 4 0 8 2 0 0 35 6 2016–17 Bundesliga 19 2 3 0 2 0 1 0 25 2 Bayern Munich 2017–18 Bundesliga 21 3 6 3 5 1 1 0 33 7 2018–19 Bundesliga 21 6 5 2 3 1 1 1 30 10 2019–20 Bundesliga 24 4 4 1 9 3 1 0 38 8 2020–21 Bundesliga 29 5 0 0 7 3 3 0 39 8 2021–22 Bundesliga 21 6 1 0 9 2 1 0 32 8 2022–23 Bundesliga 24 8 3 0 7 1 1 0 35 9 2023–24 Bundesliga 17 3 2 0 7 2 1 0 27 5 Total 199 41 28 6 57 15 10 1 294 63 Career total 233 41 32 7 59 15 12 1 336 64 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals France 2015 2 0 2016 9 1 2017 4 0 2018 0 0 2019 7 3 2020 4 1 2021 10 0 2022 10 0 2023 9 3 Total 55 8 :Scores and results list France's goal tally first.
